title: Circular Queue
subject: Data Structures
theory:
In a robust array queue, dequeue leaves unused space at start. A Circular Queue connects end to start to use that space. 
Next Position = `(Current + 1) % Size`.

common_mistakes.correction: Need to distinguish between full and empty because front==rear in both. Usually keep one slot empty or use a count variable.

real_world_use_cases.description: Round Robin scheduler uses a circular queue of processes.

summary: Optimizes memory usage for fixed-buffer streams.
